c: p:my little pony friendship is magic
d: Our friend Pia-sama brings another special adventure for Spike since he joined the crew he has had a lot of "work", especially with each crew member, starting with Captain Rarity, then Fluttershy, then it was Applejack's turn, eh even Rainbow Dash's rue who was the last, now it is the turn of the ship's cook, yes I mean Pinkie Pie, who as we know is always without clothes due to the heat of the kitchen but this time she will have another heat in mind.
n: [Western] [Pia-Sama] Lustful Diamond - Pink in the Halls (My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic) [Ongoing]
